skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vestamatic
des:
This skill enables you to add voice control to your Vestamatic VHA Smart-Controller.

Account Linking:
On the first use the skill will ask you to link the skill with your Amazon account. Use the Link Account button displayed in the Alexa app.

First Use:
After you successfully linked the skill to your account, you will have to initialize Alexa first. This will finalize the connection with Alexa. Do that by telling Alexa to initialize. 
Alexa will confirm a successful initialization.
You will then receive an email with a certification code shortly after.
This code must be entered in the Vestamatic Smart Controller App. The corresponding input field can be found in the menu tab "Settings".

Hardware Setup:
To use this skill, you will need the VHA Smart Controller Set, consisting of 
VHA-Smart Controller
VHA-WEB Server APP
IO-AIR Transceiver
